feed.title: 2025 PRX Annual Report
feed.subtitle: PRX stands at the nexus of innovation that undergirds the future of the public media system. In a year that has heralded the most dramatic shifts in public media since the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967 was signed into law, PRX remains dedicated to building the infrastructure and content portfolio that creators and stations alike need to share meaningful, empathetic, and resilient storytelling.
